meta.name: Northwoods Survival
meta.description: Northwoods Survival follows a diverse group of young Canadians as they embark on a challenging four-season mission: to build a life in the vast and unforgiving Canadian wilderness. The series takes viewers on an adventure through some of the country's most remote and rugged landscapes as these aspiring homesteaders face the harsh realities of living off the land and strive to not just survive but to thrive in these wild places, they now call home.

videos.title: Best Laid Plans
videos.overview: Margot, Matty, Billy and Emile & Gilbert begin work on their new northern homesteads.

videos.title: Winter is Coming
videos.overview: The NWS homesteaders race to finish their projects before winter fully sets in.

videos.title: Snow is a Boon
videos.overview: The harsh, northern winter has arrived, forcing Margot, Matty, Billy and Emilie & Gilbert to take on a whole new set of icy, backwoods challenges.

videos.title: Winter's Grip
videos.overview: The NWS homesteaders face off against the harsh and unforgiving northern winter as they battle to survive and thrive in the vast Canadian wilderness.

videos.title: Running Low
videos.overview: Locked in the depths of a harsh and unforgiving Canadian winter, the NWS homesteaders look to the land to help them replenish much-needed resources.

videos.title: Spring
videos.overview: Spring has finally arrived in the North. The NWS Homesteaders emerge from their winter cocoons to face a whole new set of seasonal challenges.

videos.title: Regeneration
videos.overview: As the weather warms up, the NWS homesteaders shift from survival mode to "thrival" mode!

videos.title: The Final Push
videos.overview: The NWS homesteaders race to complete their ideal, backcountry dream homes.

videos.title: You Guessed it, Winter is Coming
